Beading Circle

FREE Haircuts: Fades, Line-ups & More! 
10:00am to 2:00pm
Alexander Valley Room - Student Center 


The cost of hair care services can be expensive and sometimes prohibits students from getting proper hair care. The HUB Cultural Center recognizes this...
